# suggestedFilename

**Instance Property**

A suggested filename of a `Transferable` value.

## Declaration

```swift
var suggestedFilename: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

A filename for given item, or `nil` if none specified. A name can be specified using `TransferRepresentation.suggestedFileName(_:)`. The default implementation of this property is available to all types that conform to [doc://com.apple.CoreTransferable/documentation/CoreTransferable/Transferable] protocol.
title: suggestedFilename
